name: Electrician Simulator
description:
The Electricity Simulator will let you perform various electrical installations, according to your own creative inventiveness!
Take orders for repair or electrical installation.
Evaluate the profitability of the order and the cost of its implementation.
Complex store:
different types of wires,
various switches and sockets (various types, parameters, colors),
security, cans, counters, boxes and more!
Do you think you did the job well? Have you checked if there is a short circuit? Are you sure you have installed a waterproof electrical outlet in the bathroom?
If so, call the customer to check if everything has been done in accordance with his guidelines.
Welcome to the world of Electricity!
